loans.name: Marlina

texts.en:
Marlina is a 50-year-old married woman from Bohol, Philippines. She and her husband have been engaged in their fishing business for more than 20 years. Her husband fishes, and she sells the catch in the market.

Marlina works hard to support her husband in meeting the needs of the family. As of this time, she needs additional funds for her business. She is requesting a loan of 8,000PHP to buy new fishing nets and fuel for the boat. 

Marlina hopes to make her business a success. The income generated from the venture will be used to finance the family's daily needs, to reinvest in the business and to save.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets and fuel for the boat

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy organic manure.

loans.name: Otgontsend

texts.en:
Mr. Otgontsend is 57 years old and lives with his wife and three children in a house in the uptown ger (traditional Mongolian tent home) district in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. His wife's name is Enkhtaivan, and she helps with his coal trade business. His three children all attend school and the oldest one lives separately. 

He has been running the family coal and firewood trade business for more than ten years. His business is sustainable and has many regular customers and suppliers. His town residents appreciate him as a cheerful and friendly person. 

He is requesting a 6,500,000 MNT loan to install a heating system for his house. The ger district is not connected with the public heating system in Ulaanbaatar City, where the peak cold weather reaches minus 40 degrees.

loans.use: to install a heating system for his house.

loans.name: Las Brisas Group

texts.es:
Este Banco Comunal se llama “Las Brisas” está conformado por 17 emprendedores quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros, entre los cuales se encuentran; venta de confort, venta de pan amasado, venta de ensaladas, venta de artesanía en goma eva, venta de churrascos, venta de pasteles, servicios entre otros. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Talca.
Mónica integrante del grupo del Banco Comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra de pie, ocupando el quinto lugar de derecha a izquierda, viste un pantalón de color negro, chaqueta de color negra, su cabello es de color castaño oscuro lo usa suelto y largo. 
Ella se dedica al rubro de ventas de maravillas (semillas, en el cual se pueden utilizar de diferentes formas en aceite, o alimento de animales o consumible por el humano) desde hace 1 año. Comenta que trabaja desde su casa donde tuesta y envasa la maravilla para la venta, se dedica de  lunes a domingo y su horario lo distribuye de acuerdo a su disponibilidad.
La mercadería e insumos que va necesitando para la venta de las semillas de maravilla las compra en distribuidoras, y para envasar las semillas compra bolsas en los supermercados a bajo costo, por lo tanto conveniente económicamente.
Con el crédito comprará solamente semillas de maravillas.
Una de las metas de Mónica es comprar algunos productos como helados, además de la venta de maravillas, para generar mayores ingresos, así con esto optar a una mejor calidad de vida.
Mónica vive junto a su marido y dos hijos de 16 y 9 años de edad quienes se encuentran estudiando. Sus sueños a nivel laboral es agrandar su negocio y crecer como una microempresaria y cada vez agregar otros productos para la venta, así darle una buena estabilidad de vida su familia.
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad que le ha brindado Fondo Esperanza, ya que le ha permitido invertir en su negocio. Además se siente muy cómoda con la compañía de las demás emprendedoras del grupo del Banco Comunal, ya que comparten diferentes actividades, intereses, lo cual le ha servido como un momento de distracción. Respecto a las capacitaciones impartidas en las reuniones, ha aprendido administrar su negocio de mejor manera.
Talca pertenece a la región del Maule, ubicada en la zona centro del país. Constituye el centro administrativo, económico y cultural de la región, siendo la ciudad más importante del Valle Central chileno. Sobre Talca existe una curiosa referencia en Chile, la frase "Talca, París, y Londres". Entre los mitos al respecto, algunos dicen que es una derivación de la originalmente dicha por un inglés "Talca parece Londres", por la abundante neblina que cubre frecuentemente la ciudad en la temporada invernal, a semejanza de la capital del Reino Unido.
texts.en:
The name of this communal bank is Las Brisas. It comprises seventeen entrepreneurs who work in different trades, which include selling bath tissue, "pan amasado" (a Chilean homemade bread), salads, EVA foam crafts, steak sandwiches, pastries, and other services. They all belong to the city of Talca.

Mónica is one of the members of this communal bank. In the picture she is the fifth person from the right, wearing black pants and a black jacket, with brown long hair. She has worked selling sunflower seeds for one year. These seeds can be used in different ways: to make oil, to feed animals, or for human consumption. She says she works from home, where she roasts the sunflower seeds and packs them for sale. She works Monday through Sunday and distributes her schedule according to her availability.

She buys whatever merchandise and supplies she needs to sell her sunflower seeds from distributors, and at the supermarket she buys low-cost bags to pack the seeds, which are the most affordable.

She will use the loan only to purchase sunflower seeds.

One of Mónica's goals is to purchase some items, such as ice cream, to sell in addition to the sunflower seeds and generate more income so that she may access a better quality of life.

Mónica lives with her husband and their two children, who are sixteen and nine and are in school. On a business level, her dreams are to expand her business and grow as a microentrepreneur by adding more and more products to sell so that she can offer her family good stability in life.

She is very happy and grateful for the opportunity Fondo Esperanza has given her, because it has allowed her to invest in her business. She also feels very comfortable around the other entrepreneurs in the communal bank group, because they share different activities and interests, and that provides some leisure. As far as the trainings offered at the meetings, they have helped her manage her business better.

Talca belongs to the Maule region, located in the central area of the country. It constitutes the administrative, financial, and cultural center of the region, being the most important city of Chile's central valley. In Chile, there is a curious saying about Talca: "Talca, París y Londres" (Talca, Paris, and London). Among the myths explaining this, some say it is derived from something originally said by an Englishman: "Talca parece Londres" (Talca looks like London) on account of the fog that frequently covers the city during the winter season, as it does in the capital of the United Kingdom. (Both phrases sound virtually the same in Spanish).

loans.use: to purchase sunflower seeds.

loans.name: Latifeh

texts.en:
Latifeh is a 56-year-old conservative married woman, so she asked her son to take her place in the photo.

Latifeh wishes for her son to complete his studies and get his BA degree. Now that he is majoring in economics, she wants to support him and pay for his upcoming semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for her son's upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Purew

texts.en: Mr. Purew is 37 years old and lives with his wife and two children in the Uvurhangai province of Mongolia. In 2003, Mr. Purew started his local and urban passenger transit service by minibus. He upgraded his vehicle to an autobus in 2010 and has already gained recognition from his clients and customers. Since 2010, his wife has planted organic vegetables in their back yard and then sells them in the local market. Now his wife is planning to sell the organic vegetables in the Ulaanbaatar market, where the prices are higher. They bought a new jeep with their business profit in 2012. He is requesting a 2,000,000 MNT loan to harvest his wife's organic vegetables and transport them to the Ulaanbaatar market. He is a hardworking and diligent man.

loans.use: To harvest his wife's organic vegetables and transport them to the Ulaanbaatar market

loans.name: Wangui

texts.en:
Wangui is 34 years old and married to Maso. They are blessed with two children, ages 17 and two years old. She has been in business for one year and earns KES5,500. 

This is her first loan from KADET LTD, which she will use to purchase more animals for fattening and to sell later at a profit. The anticipated profit she gets will be used to expand her business.

Her dream is to educate her children and to better her family life.

loans.use: To purchase animals for fattening and to sell later at a profit.

loans.name: Otgon

texts.en:
Otgon, 42 years old, lives with his wife and three children in Arhangai. His oldest child is a secondary school student and his youngest son goes to kindergarten. Over the last ten years he has been operating a plastic, can, and glass scrap business out of his garage. His business is sustainable and has many regular customers and suppliers. This business is a green business, and his monthly profit is around 500,000-1,000,000MNT. 

He wants to buy more products, which he will then sell to increase his business income as well as profit. He is requesting 2,000,000 MNT to purchase more product for his recycled materials trading business. He is a hardworking, creative, and aggressive man.

loans.use: To purchase more products for his recycled materials trading business

loans.name: Qasem

texts.en: Qasem is a 20-year-old single guy living with his family of ten members. He is attending the university to get his BA degree in Psychology. Qasem wants to start depending on himself to decrease the financial pressure on his family. For that reason, he has applied for this loan to be able to pay for his registration and semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for his registration and semester fees

loans.name: Musa

texts.en:
Musa is 36 years old and is married to Kijoolu. They are blessed with one child who is two years. He has been buying and selling animals for one year, with an income of KES5,500 monthly. 

This is his  first loan from KADET LTD, and he plans to purchase more animals for fattening and then selling at a profit. The profit he makes he will use to educate his children. His dream is to have a better future for his family.

loans.use: To purchase more animals for fattening

loans.name: Marina

texts.en:
Marina lives in Armavir town with her 15-year-old son, Lyova. She runs a salon, where she trades in perfumes and provides cosmetology services. Marina started this business ten years ago. 

Marina would like to improve conditions in her salon, for which she needs sufficient funds. With the help of this loan she will purchase special chairs for makeup services. In addition, she plans to purchase perfumes for the salon. 

Marina dreams of founding a big hairdressing salon with a large variety of services. This loan will help her to develop the business and gather additional income, which she plans to invest in further expansion of her business.

loans.use: to pay for perfumes and chairs for her salon.

loans.name: Bahaa

texts.en:
Bahaa is from Iraq. He is a youth client, age 30 years old and single. He lives with a family of nine members, four of whom are employed. 

Bahaa owns a pastry shop. He specializes in Arabic sweets. He established his business in 2007 and now he has one employee. He has a good experience in this field and a good reputation in his local community.

He is requesting a $2,700 Youth Loan to pay the annual rent for the shop. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family with better life conditions.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent for the shop.

loans.name: Flores De Bergel Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “FLOR DE BERGEL” iniciará el primero ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Senkata, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Senia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: tienda de barrio, venta de ropa interior, salón de peinados, venta de puertas, costura de chamarras, venta de verduras, venta de pasacalles.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Senia es una integrante, ella indica que hace doce años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de sus amigas quienes son socias de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tienda de barrio, mismo que aprendió de un negocio anterior al que apoyaba, emprendiendo posteriormente su propio negocio.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de arroz, azúcar, aceite) que comprará de las comerciantes mayoristas y posteriormente lo comercializará en la en su espacio de comercialización todos los días. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el ahorro.
texts.en:
The "Flor de Bergel" communal bank will begin its first cycle in Pro Mujer as part of its Senkata regional office. This group is composed of eight members and is run by a board of directors, of which Senia is the president. The businesses that the communal bank's members run are varied, but among them are a neighborhood store, underwear sales, a hair salon, door sales, jacket-making, vegetable sales, and banner sales.

The loan that they will receive will benefit small micro-entrepreneurs, like Senia. Senia indicates that she has been a member of Pro Mujer for two years, joining at the invitation of her friends, who are members of the institution. Currently, she has a neighborhood shop. She learned how to run a neighborhood shop from a previous business that she helped out with, launching her own business subsequently.

The loan that she is now requesting is to increase her capital to buy rice, sugar, and oil. She will buy them from wholesalers and later offer them for sale in her sales location every day. This line of work allows her to generate resources to support her family as much as possible, as she is married and has four children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, Senia responds that she likes saving money.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, and oil.

loans.name: Los Alamos Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LOS ALAMOS” iniciará el ciclo primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Villa Exaltación, está compuesta por once integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Gladys es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de productos de belleza, venta de edredones, tienda de barrio, fabricación de estantes, transportista, costura de deportivos, elaboración de pan, ropa para niños, venta de muebles.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Gladys es una integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de su cuñada que es socias de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de productos de belleza, ella cuenta que hace varios años ella era la consumidora de estos productos y posteriormente ella decide emprender esta actividad por recomendación de su hermana y su tía. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de productos de belleza) que comprará de las empresas distribuidoras y posteriormente lo comercializará a pedido. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es soltera y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el incentivo y el ánimo que dan.

En la fotografía no se encuentra la señora Juana ya que se fue a consulta médica.
texts.en:
The community bank “Los Alamos” is starting its first loan cycle with Pro Mujer, through the organization's regional office in Villa Exaltación.  The group is comprised of eleven members and is overseen by a board of directors, of which Gladys is the president.  The community bank members are involved in a variety of businesses, including the sale of beauty products, sports clothes, children's clothing, quilts, and furniture.  Other businesses include shelf-building, taxi services, bread-making and a neighborhood shop.

This loan will benefit the small microbusinesses of these entrepreneurs, including that of Gladys.  She reports that this is the group's first time working with Pro Mujer.  She was invited by her sister-in-law, who is a member of Pro Mujer.  Currently she has a business selling beauty products.  She says that for several years she was a consumer of these products, and eventually she decided to learn the business upon the recommendation of her sister and her aunt.

She is seeking this loan in order to increase her working capital and purchase beauty products. She will buy these items from distributors and then sell them door-to-door.  This will enable her to generate income to support her family in the best way possible, since she is single and has two children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responded that she likes the motivation and positive atmosphere that the group provides.

Note: Juana, another member, was unable to be present due to a doctor's appointment.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Soledad

texts.es:
Soledad es una joven de 21 años de edad, su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Pisco, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima muy cálido y acogedor, asimismo posee lugares muy bellos los cuales son muy visitados por mucho turistas en todo el año como las Islas ballestas, el candelabro de paracas; asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura en especial el cultivo de algodón, maíz, pallares, entre otros. Soledad aprendió a trabajar desde muy pequeña, por ello y debido a los pocos recursos económicos ella solo estudio hasta el quinto grado de educación secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar enfermería.

Día a día Soledad trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de productos de belleza, ella le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 9 horas al día y puede atender hasta 15 clientes diariamente; ella cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es amable con los clientes y también porque tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante.

Soledad está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mostradores para colocar sus productos y exhibirlos de mejor manera, así ella podrá ofrecer mejor sus productos y mejorar sus ingresos, lo que le permitirá seguir trabajando muy duro para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia y tener un negocio más grande”.
texts.en:
Soledad, 21, is a young woman living in the city of Pisco, a city noted for its very hot, welcoming climate.  It also has beautiful places that are visited year-round by tourists like the Ballestas Islands and the Paracas Candelabrum.  Agriculture is common here too, especially growing cotton, corn and lima beans, among others.  

Soledad learned how to work when she was still little.  Because of that and because of her family’s limited economic resources she only studied up to 5th grade of secondary school but would have liked to have studied nursing.

Soledad works day to day in her small business selling beauty products.  She spends about 9 hours daily at work and can tend to up to 15 customers daily.  She believes she does well at work because she’s kind to customers and also because she has a strong drive to get ahead.

Soledad is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they are giving her she will be able to buy display cases to exhibit her wares in a better way.  In this way she will be able to better display her products and improve her income which will make it possible for her to continue working very hard to make her greatest dream a reality: to own a house and to have a bigger business.

loans.use: to buy display cases.

loans.name: Narantsetseg

texts.en:
Mrs. Narantsetseg, 50, works as a watchman in the common apartment.  Her husband, Galbadrakh, is a taxi driver and he makes crafts and sells them to the customers in the bazaar for extra earnings. 

Narantsetseg lives with her family in an old house which was built many years ago. The house has a heat loss and emission through its walls and some other parts. In winter they feel very cold and use the coal-fired stove to stay warm at home. 

Before this winter, she wants to repair her house and make wall insulation to it. As she told us, “It will be very beneficial to reduce my cost of coal purchasing. Yet, it will be healthful to the environment (if) I could reduce the coal usage in winter.”

The loan she is taking will be used to buy the insulation materials such as the foam, cement, etc. to make the wall insulation to her old house before the winter.

loans.use: to make wall insulation to her old house before the winter.

loans.name: Faridun

texts.ru: Фаридуну 19 лет. Он очень талантливый и успешный студент. Фаридун учится на 2 курсе Медицинского Колледжа фармацевтического отдела. Он очень упорно учится и хочет стать хорошим фармацевтом и служить своему народу. Он живет с родителями. Зарплата его родителей не хватает, чтобы оплатить за учебу в колледже. Фаридун запрашивает кредит для оплаты учебы. Будущий фармацевт ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Faridun is 19 years old.  He is a very talented and successful student.  Faridun is a second-year student at the pharmaceutical department of the Medical College.  He studies very diligently and wants to become a good pharmacist and serve his people.  He lives with his parents.  The parents' salary is not enough to pay for his college education.  Faridun is requesting a loan to pay for his education.  The future pharmacist awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for his college education

loans.name: Miraly

texts.ru: Мирали 49 лет. Он женат. Его жену зовут Латофат. Мирали на воспитании имеет 3 детей. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами 4 года назад он начал свой бизнес с куплей продажей женской и детской одежды. Его эффективность помогает ему быть успешным в бизнесе. Он продает свой товар на местном рынке и имеет большой круг клиентов. У него тонкий вкус и он умеет выбрать товар, который имеет большой спрос. Несмотря на все его достоинства, мощная конкуренция  делового мира, заставляет его быть внимательным и обновлять товар каждый сезон. Он должен купить товар для нового сезона, но не имеет достаточного средства для этого. Он запрашивает кредит на сумму 4000 сомони для покупки товара для нового сезона. Он ждет вашу доброту. Давайте, ему поможем держать свой стимул среди бизнесменов.
texts.en: Miraly is 49 years old, married.  His wife's name is Latofat.  Miraly is raising three children.  In order to provide his family with all of the necessities, he started his own business of buying and selling women's and children's clothing four years ago.  His efficiency helps him to be successful in the business.  He sells his merchandise at a local market and has a large circle of customers.  He has intricate taste and can choose merchandise, which will be in high demand.  Despite all of his strengths, a powerful competition of the business world forces him to be attentive and renew his merchandise every season.  Miraly must purchase merchandise for the new season, but does not have enough means to do so.  He is requesting a loan in the amount of 4000 somoni to purchase merchandise for the new season.  He awaits your kindness.  Let's help him uphold his motivation among businessmen.

loans.use: purchase merchandise for the new season

loans.name: Soninbayar

texts.en:
Soninbayar, who is 38 years old, lives with his wife and three children in a ger (a Mongolian yurt) in the Uvurhangai province of Mongolia. His wife's name is Byambasuren, and she is 40 years old. His two youngest children are school students and his oldest son is a college student. 

Soninbayar has conducted a taxi and public transportation business since 2003 and is recognized in the local market for his work in this business. In 2011, he built a house with his business profit. Now, Soninbayar is requesting a loan of 2,500,000 MNT to purchase a furnace and insulation for his house. He is an honest, hardworking, and friendly man.

loans.use: to purchase a furnace and insulation for his house.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy furniture for her sales location.

loans.name: Musulmonkul

texts.ru: Мусулмонкул всегда старается выполнить свои задачи во время и поэтому он является одним из успешных работников. Ему 46 лет, он женат и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Его дети Олим, Субхия, Шукрона очень умные и послушные, им 16, 13 и 3 года. Его жена Рухшона является домохозяйкой. Мунсулмонкул работает бухгалтером в организации и получает маленькую зарплату. Его зарплата не хватает для ремонта дома. Мусулмонкул планирует заменить окна, двери, сделать фасадную штукатурку и устройство пола и потолка. Он запрашивает кредит на сумму 1800 долларов США для покупки строительных материалов. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Musulmonkul always tries to complete his tasks on-time, and this is why he is one of the successful workers.  He is 46 years old, married and raising three children.  His children, Olim, Subhiya and Shukrona, are very smart and well-behaved.  They are 16, 13 and 3 years old.  His wife, Ruhshona, is a homemaker.  Musulmonkul works as an accountant at an organization and earns a small salary.  His salary is not enough to repair his house.  Musulmonkul plans to replace the windows, doors, apply plaster to the facade and repair floors and ceilings.  He is requesting a loan in the amount of $1800 to purchase construction materials.  He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials and repair his house

loans.name: Oygul

texts.ru: Ойгул проживает в районе Шахритус. Ей 49 лет. Она замужем. Сын Ойгул находится за рубежом. Сама она занимается животноводством. Вот уже десять лет как Ойгул занимается купле-продажей крупнорогатого скота. Она просит кредит для закупа крупнорогатого и мелко - рогатого скота, чтобы увеличить поголовья и получить больше прибыли.
texts.en: Oygul lives in the Shahrituz district.  She is 49 years old, married.  Her son is abroad.  Oygul is involved in animal husbandry.  She has been involved in buying and selling cattle for ten years.  Oygul is requesting this loan to buy cattle and small livestock in order to increase livestock headcount and make a larger profit.

loans.use: to buy cattle and small livestock in order to increase livestock headcount and make a larger profit

loans.name: Roziya

texts.ru: Розие 46 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. Более 24 лет она работает медсестрой. Розия очень любит и гордится своей профессией. Ее дочь Азима окончила среднюю школу и хочет поступить в Медицинский Колледж. Азима хочет стать успешной медсестрой и продолжать работу матери. Зарплата Розии не хватает для оплаты учебы дочери в колледже. Розия запрашивает кредит для оплаты учебы дочери. Розия и Азима ждут вашу доброту.
texts.en: Roziya is 46 years old.  She is married and raising four children.  She has been working as a nurse for over 24 years.  Roziya loves her profession very much and is proud of it.  Her daughter, Azima, finished a secondary school and wants to go to the Medical College.  Azima wants to become a successful nurse and continue her mother's work.  Roziya's salary is not enough to pay for her daughter's college education.  Roziya is requesting this loan to pay for her daughter's education.  Roziya and Azima await your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's education at the medical college

loans.name: Uranchimeg

texts.en:
Uranchimeg is 44 and lives with her family in the ger district, an area of the city with no running water, minimal roads and spotty electricity in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. For the past 11 years, she has been working nonstop as a cook. Since 2008, Uranchimeg has been building a new family house in her plot of land but has not been able to complete it due to the shortage of money.

Uranchimeg is requesting a loan to pay for and install a water-heated furnace in her new house. She says it will be very important to cut her usage of harmful coal for heating.

loans.use: to pay for a water-heated furnace for her home

loans.name: Bat-Amgalan

texts.en:
Bat-Amgalan is 33 and an economist. He graduated university in 2000 and recently became employed. Bat-Amgalan lives with his family in a common apartment with two rooms in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. In winter his apartment becomes cold and hard to heat due to heat escaping through his out-dated windows. His children always get sick due to their cold home. His family has not repaired or renovated their apartment since they moved in many years ago. 

Bat-Amgalan is requesting a loan to replace his old windows with double-glazed ones. He said that “it will be very useful and healthy to his family members." Bat-Amgalan's loan will be used to cover the cost of the new double glazed windows to improve his family house.

loans.use: to replace his old windows with double-glazed ones and renovate his family home

loans.name: Montaser

texts.en:
Montaser is a 23-year-old man. He is married and a father to one daughter.

Montaser is studying at the university, specializing in Business Administration. He wants to complete his studies but needs a loan to pay the university fees, so he is requesting a loan of 1,000 USD from FATEN to help him cover the university fees. This will ensure a better future for him and improve his family's living conditions. 

Montaser is photographed in the picture.

loans.use: to pay for university fees.

loans.name: Basem

texts.en:
Basem is from Iraq. He is 40 years old, married and has three children. He is the only provider for the family.

Basem owns a car repairing shop. He specializes in repairing car bodies. He established his business in 2005. He has good experience in this field and a good reputation in his local community.

Basem is requesting a loan of $3000 to buy a machine specialized for his work and install rolling shutters and an external ceiling for his shop. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide better living conditions for his family.

loans.use: to buy a machine specialized for his work and install rolling shutters and an external ceiling for his shop.
